channel.title: Ruby on Rift Hacking
channel.description: Recent content in Ruby on Rift Hacking

item.title: Precious Writeup - HTB
item.description: Precious is an easy linux machine created by Nauten on Hack the Box that features a web server that uses a version of PDFKit that is vulnerable to CVE-2022-25765, which can be exploited to execute commands as the user ruby.
